definition: to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: I always jump introduction to read books.
sentences.chinese: 我看書時常常略去緒論。

sentences.english: I read newspaper, is wearing a Presbyopia mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我看書報時，是戴了老花眼鏡。

sentences.english: He time and newspapers every day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天花更多的時間看書報。

sentences.english: Asked what he was busy, he said that reading.
sentences.chinese: 問他在忙什麼，他說在看書。

sentences.english: You can do some reading while you are waiting for the train.
sentences.chinese: 你在等火車的時候可以看看書。

sentences.english: In the evenings I usually read or talked with Grandma.
sentences.chinese: 晚上我一般看看書或和外婆聊聊天。

sentences.english: Linda, turn down the record player. I'm trying to read.
sentences.chinese: 琳達，把電唱機關小聲點，我想看書。

sentences.english: Mary never does any reading in the evening, nor does Jane.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗晚上從不看書，簡也不看。

sentences.english: Your posture of reading and writing must be proper, or you will get spondylopathy.
sentences.chinese: 看書寫字的姿勢一定要端正，否則容易得脊椎病。

sentences.english: And then she turned back to the book.
sentences.chinese: 之後又低下頭看書去了。

sentences.english: He plods away at his studies every night, but he doesn't enjoy the work.
sentences.chinese: 他每天晚上都認真看書，但他一點也不喜歡這樣做。

sentences.english: You're truing to read with the radio playing. How does it affect you?
sentences.chinese: 你看書時收音機開着，這對你有何影響？

sentences.english: I lay reading in a hot foamy bath.
sentences.chinese: 我躺在滿是泡沫的熱澡盆裏看書。

sentences.english: My hobbies is to listen to music, look at the books on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 我的興趣愛好也就是聽聽音樂，看看書，上上網。

sentences.english: You do it. Yeah, you know where you read this.
sentences.chinese: 你這麼做，而且你知道你在哪裏看書。

sentences.english: The little boy is reading a magarizonaine in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 這個小男孩正躺在陽光下看書。

definition: to stare blankly/to be stunned/to be lost in thought
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
what are you doing?/what's he up to?
to play/to have fun/to hang out
to live alone/to spend time alone (or with a significant other)
